title: Person of Interest 2x19 Promo #2 "Trojan Horse" (HD)
author: televisionpromos
description:
Person of Interest 2x19 "Trojan Horse" - When the number of a leading tech executive comes up, Finch infiltrates her corporation to gather intel but can't determine whether she is working in her company's best interest or planning to destroy it from the inside. Meanwhile, Carter continues to question Detective Beecher's integrity after he provides incriminating information about a fellow detective, on PERSON OF INTEREST, Thursday, April 4th on CBS. Subscribe to televisionpromos on YouTube for more Person of Interest season 2 promos in HD!
